message.name: ERR_CASEREL_FV_RELATEDCASEID
message.locale: Related case ID must be specified.

message.name: ERR_CASEREL_XRV_STATUS_CLOSED
message.locale: The case has a status of closed. A relationship with it cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_CASEREL_XFV_START_DATE_END_DATE
message.locale: The case relationship end date cannot precede the start date.

message.name: ERR_CASEREL_XRV_START_DATE_PRECEEDS_CASES
message.locale: The case relationship start date cannot precede the start dates of both cases.

message.name: ERR_CASEREL_FV_START_DATE
message.locale: The case relationship start date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CASEREL_FV_TYPE
message.locale: You must specify type for this case relationship.

message.name: ERR_CASEREL_FV_PRIMARYCLIENT
message.locale: Related cases must have the same primary client.

message.name: ERR_CASEREL_XRV_START_DATE_AFTER_CASES
message.locale: The case relationship start date cannot be later than the end dates of both cases.

message.name: ERR_CASEREL_XRV_RELATED_CASE_ID_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: These cases have already been related.

message.name: ERR_CASEREL_XRV_END_DATE_AFTER_CASES
message.locale: The case relationship end date cannot be later than the end dates of both cases.
